sentences.en: a note with subtle variances of pitch
sentences.cn: 音高有细微变化的音符

sentences.en: an all-weather football pitch
sentences.cn: 全天候足球场

sentences.en: Eriksson described him as "the best player on the pitch"
sentences.cn: 埃里克森称他是“场上最好的球员”。

sentences.en: Footballers in whopping great studded boots walk over the pitch.
sentences.cn: 脚蹬帅气钉靴的足球运动员走进了球场。

sentences.en: Frances kept talking, her mind at fever pitch.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝不停地说着，头脑处于极度兴奋状态。

sentences.en: He raised his voice to an even higher pitch.
sentences.cn: 他把音调抬得更高了。

sentences.en: He ran the length of the pitch and scored.
sentences.cn: 他跑过全场，得分了。

sentences.en: His first pitch was high and wide.
sentences.cn: 他的第一投又高又偏。

sentences.en: His sales pitch was smooth and convincing.
sentences.cn: 他的推销词流畅又有说服力。

sentences.en: It was pitch-dark in the room and I couldn't see a thing.
sentences.cn: 房间里一片漆黑，我什么也看不见。

sentences.en: pitched on the ideal solution.
sentences.cn: 做出理想的决定

sentences.en: Prue invited the magazine's editor to lunch and made her pitch.
sentences.cn: 普吕邀请该杂志的编辑共进午餐，推销自己的点子。

sentences.en: She crumpled up the page and pitched it into the fire.
sentences.cn: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。

sentences.en: Speculation about his future had reached fever pitch .
sentences.cn: 关于他的前途的猜测达到了狂想的地步。

sentences.en: The ground staff do all they can to prepare the pitch.
sentences.cn: 运动场管理员全力整备球场。

sentences.en: The match is off because of a waterlogged pitch.
sentences.cn: 由于场地积水太多比赛被取消了。

sentences.en: The night was as black as pitch (= very dark ) .
sentences.cn: 夜晚一片漆黑。

sentences.en: The timbers of similar houses were painted with pitch.
sentences.cn: 类似房屋所用的栋木刷了沥青。

sentences.en: There was a peaceful pitch invasion after Milan's eighth goal.
sentences.cn: 米兰队攻入第八粒进球后，观众有序地涌进球场。

sentences.en: Try and pitch your tent on level ground.
sentences.cn: 试试在平地上搭帐篷。

sentences.en: Ultrasonic waves are at a higher pitch than the human ear can hear.
sentences.cn: 超声波的音高超出了人耳可以听见的范围。

sentences.en: United left the pitch looking stunned and drained.
sentences.cn: 曼联队离开球场时看上去备受打击，身心俱疲。
